{{Description|At the "[[Children of Echoes]]" stage, a graffiti expert extends a grand invitation to you and Paimon, "to travel around Natlan in search of inspiration"...}}
'''Traces of Artistry''' is a [[Flagship Event]] in [[Version 5.0]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* After the Version 5.0 update - 2024/09/16 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
* Complete Archon Quest [[Chapter V]]: Act II "[[Black Stone Under a White Stone]]" first to get the best experience from this event.

===Summary===
* During the event, head over to where [[Children of Echoes]], [[People of the Springs]], and [[Scions of the Canopy]] reside respectively in search of inspiration and unlock the following gameplay modes: "Flow's True Form," "Blazing Extremes," "Of Aspects Vivid."
* In the "[[Traces of Artistry/Flow's True Form|Flow's True Form]]" gameplay, you must use the skills and special traits of different [[Saurian]]s to reach the destination within a time limit and collect as many Challenge Coins and Orbs of Inspiration as possible to increase your challenge rating and obtain better rewards.
* In the "[[Traces of Artistry/Blazing Extremes|Blazing Extremes]]" gameplay, you must head to multiple arenas one by one to defeat the [[opponent]](s) in a designated area and challenge powerful foes to complete special objectives.
* In the "[[Traces of Artistry/Of Aspects Vivid|Of Aspects Vivid]]" gameplay, complete challenges including [[Kamera|taking photos]], picking [[regional specialties]], unlocking [[Statues of The Seven]] and [[Viewpoints]], etc. to obtain the corresponding rewards. After the event begins, picked regional specialties, unlocked Statues of The Seven and Viewpoints, etc. will all count towards challenge progress.
* Complete the challenges in search of inspiration in different gameplay modes to gain [[Colorful Contemplation]]s. Reach a certain amount of Colorful Contemplations to obtain [[Ash-Graven Drinking Horn]] (Catalyst), [[Primogem]]s, [[Crown of Insight]], event-exclusive Weapon [[Refinement Material]]s, and other rewards.
